alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, southern Walton and Washington Counties through 1100 AM EDT/1000 AM CDT/... At 1014 AM EDT/914 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Santa Rosa Beach to 12 miles south of Panama City Beach to 26 miles southwest of Port St. Joe. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Eglin Air Force Base, Tyndall Air Force Base, Live Oak, Parker, Freeport, Wausau, Ebro, Villa Tasso, Allanton and Dirego Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
